trans-unit.source: Exposes the public members of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> class to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 向非托管代码公开 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 类的公共成员。

trans-unit.source: This interface is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此接口是用于访问到托管类，从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: This interface preserves the vtable order of the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType> class members that can be accessed by unmanaged COM objects.
trans-unit.target: 此接口可保留的 vtable 顺序<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType>类可以访问由非托管 COM 对象的成员。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.Attributes" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.Attributes" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The attributes of this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的特性。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.Attributes%2A> property gets the attributes of this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.Attributes%2A>属性获取此属性的特性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.CanRead" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.CanRead" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this property can be read; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性可读，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.CanRead%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the property can be read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.CanRead%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示是否可以读取属性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.CanWrite" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.CanWrite" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this property can be written to; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性可写，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.CanWrite%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the property can be written to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.CanWrite%2A>属性获取一个值，该值指示属性是否可写。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Type" /> object for the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: 声明该成员的类的 <see langword="Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType%2A> property gets the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType%2A>属性获取声明此成员的类。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.Equals(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Object.Equals(System.Object)" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see langword="true" /> 等于当前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，则为 <see cref="T:System.Object" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法确定是否指定<xref:System.Object>等同于当前<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetAccessors" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetAccessors" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetAccessors%2A> methods return an array of the `get` and `set` accessors on this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetAccessors%2A>方法返回的数组`get`和`set`上此属性访问器。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetAccessors" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetAccessors" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> objects that reflect the public <see langword="get" />, <see langword="set" />, and other accessors of the property reflected by the current instance, if accessors are found; otherwise, this method returns an array with zero (0) elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到访问器，则返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象的数组，这些对象反射了由当前实例反射的属性的公共 <see langword="get" />、<see langword="set" /> 以及其他访问器；如果没有找到访问器，则返回包含零 (0) 个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetAccessors%2A> method returns an array whose elements reflect the public `get`, `set`, and other accessors of the property reflected by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetAccessors%2A>方法返回一个数组，其元素反射公共`get`， `set`，及其他访问器的当前实例反射的属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include non-public methods in the returned <see langword="MethodInfo" /> array; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示在返回的 <see langword="MethodInfo" /> 数组中包含非公共方法；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetAccessors(System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetAccessors(System.Boolean)" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> objects whose elements reflect the <see langword="get" />, <see langword="set" />, and other accessors of the property reflected by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象的数组，其元素反射了由当前实例反射的属性的 <see langword="get" />、<see langword="set" /> 及其他访问器。

trans-unit.source: If the <paramref name="nonPublic" /> parameter is <see langword="true" />, this array contains public and non-public <see langword="get" />, <see langword="set" />, and other accessors.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 参数为 <see langword="true" />，则此数组包含公共及非公共 <see langword="get" />、<see langword="set" /> 及其他访问器。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is <see langword="false" />, this array contains only public <see langword="get" />, <see langword="set" />, and other accessors.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 为 <see langword="false" />，则此数组仅包含公共 <see langword="get" />、<see langword="set" /> 及其他访问器。

trans-unit.source: If no accessors with the specified visibility are found, this method returns an array with zero (0) elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有找到具有指定可见性的访问器，则此方法将返回包含零 (0) 个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetAccessors%2A> method returns an array whose elements reflect the public and, if specified, non-public `get`, `set`, and other accessors of the property reflected by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetAccessors%2A>方法返回一个数组，其元素反射公共并且，如果指定了非公共`get`， `set`，及其他访问器的当前实例反射的属性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> methods return all attributes applied to this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法返回应用于此成员的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: true to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: true 表示搜索此成员的继承链以查找这些特性；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(System.Boolean)" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains all the custom attributes, or an array with zero elements if no attributes are defined.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含所有自定义属性的数组，在未定义任何特性时为包含零个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method returns an array containing all the custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法返回包含所有自定义特性的数组。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: Only attributes that are assignable to this type are returned.
trans-unit.target: 仅返回可分配给此类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: true to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: true 表示搜索此成员的继承链以查找这些特性；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: An array of custom attributes applied to this member, or an array with zero (0) elements if no attributes have been applied.
trans-unit.target: 应用于此成员的自定义属性的数组；如果未应用任何特性，则为包含零 (0) 个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method returns an array of custom attributes identified by <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法返回包含由标识的自定义特性的数组<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod%2A> methods return a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object representing the `get` accessor for this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象，表示`get`此属性访问器。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object representing the public <see langword="get" /> accessor for this property, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see langword="get" /> accessor is non-public or does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象，表示此属性的公共 <see langword="get" /> 访问器；如果 <see langword="null" /> 访问器是非公共的或不存在，则为 <see langword="get" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod%2A> method returns the public `get` accessor for this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod%2A>方法返回公共`get`此属性访问器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to return a non-public <see langword="get" /> accessor; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示返回非公共的 <see langword="get" /> 访问器；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod(System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod(System.Boolean)" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object representing the <see langword="get" /> accessor for this property, if the <paramref name="nonPublic" /> parameter is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 参数为 <see langword="true" />，则返回表示此属性的 <see langword="get" /> 访问器的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Or <see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is <see langword="false" /> and the <see langword="get" /> accessor is non-public, or if <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is <see langword="true" /> but no <see langword="get" /> accessors exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 为 <see langword="false" /> 且 <see langword="get" /> 访问器是非公共的，或者 <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 为 <see langword="true" /> 但是不存在 <see langword="get" /> 访问器，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod%2A> method returns the public or non-public `get` accessor for this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod%2A>方法返回的公共或非公共`get`此属性访问器。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.GetHashCode" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Object.GetHashCode" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> method serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>方法用作特定类型的哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> 是适合在哈希算法和数据结构，如哈希表中使用。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 留待将来使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: An array of names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要映射的名称的数组。

trans-unit.source: The count of the names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要映射的名称的计数。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret the names.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中解释名称的区域设置上下文。

trans-unit.source: An array allocated by the caller that receives the identifiers corresponding to the names.
trans-unit.target: 调用方分配的数组，用于接收对应于这些名称的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 将一组名称映射为对应的一组调度标识符。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetIndexParameters" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetIndexParameters" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> containing the parameters for the indexes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> 类型的数组，它包含索引的参数。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetIndexParameters%2A> method returns an array of all the index parameters for the property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetIndexParameters%2A>方法返回的属性的所有索引参数的数组

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod%2A> methods return a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object representing the `set` accessor for this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象，表示`set`此属性访问器。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object representing the <see langword="Set" /> method for this property if the <see langword="set" /> accessor is public, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see langword="set" /> accessor is not public.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 访问器是公共的，则为表示此属性的 <see langword="Set" /> 方法的 <see langword="set" /> 对象；如果 <see langword="null" /> 访问器是非公共的，则为 <see langword="set" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod%2A> method returns the public `set` accessor for this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod%2A>方法返回公共`set`此属性访问器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to return a non-public accessor; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示返回非公共访问器；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod(System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod(System.Boolean)" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: One of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中的值之一。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Meaning
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 含义

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object representing the <see langword="Set" /> method for this property.
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term>表示此属性的 <see langword="Set" /> 方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />对象。

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The <see langword="set" /> accessor is public.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><see langword="set" /> 访问器是公共的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="nonPublic" /> parameter is <see langword="true" /> and the <see langword="set" /> accessor is non-public.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 参数为 <see langword="true" />，且 <see langword="set" /> 访问器是非公共的。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="null" /></term><description> The <paramref name="nonPublic" /> parameter is <see langword="true" />, but the property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="null" /></term><description><paramref name="nonPublic" /> 参数为 <see langword="true" />但是属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="nonPublic" /> parameter is <see langword="false" /> and the <see langword="set" /> accessor is non-public.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 参数为 <see langword="false" />，且 <see langword="set" /> 访问器是非公共的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: There is no <see langword="set" /> accessor.
trans-unit.target: 不存在 <see langword="set" /> 访问器。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod%2A> method returns the `set` accessor for this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod%2A>方法返回`set`此属性访问器。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.GetType" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Object.GetType" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method gets the type of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>方法获取当前实例的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type information to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier for the type information.
trans-unit.target: 类型信息的区域设置标识符。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the requested type information object.
trans-unit.target: 指向请求的类型信息对象的指针。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can be used to get the type information for an interface.
trans-unit.target: 检索对象的类型信息，然后可以使用该信息获取接口的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时包含一个用于接收对象提供的类型信息接口数量的位置指针。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).
trans-unit.target: 检索对象提供的类型信息接口的数量（0 或 1）。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue%2A> methods return the value of the property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue%2A>方法返回的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The object whose property value will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 将返回其属性值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Optional index values for indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 索引化属性的可选索引值。

trans-unit.source: This value should be <see langword="null" /> for non-indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 对于非索引化属性，该值应为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue(System.Object,System.Object[])" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue(System.Object,System.Object[])" /> 方法的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The property value for the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> 参数的属性值。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue%2A> method returns a literal value associated with the property by a compiler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue%2A>方法返回由编译器与属性关联的文本值。

trans-unit.source: The object whose property value will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 将返回其属性值的对象。

trans-unit.source: The invocation attribute.
trans-unit.target: 调用属性。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see langword="BindingFlags" />: <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="CreateInstance" />, <see langword="Static" />, <see langword="GetField" />, <see langword="SetField" />, <see langword="GetProperty" />, or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 中的位标志：<see langword="InvokeMethod" /><see langword="CreateInstance" /><see langword="Static" /><see langword="GetField" /><see langword="SetField" /><see langword="GetProperty" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: A suitable invocation attribute must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定合适的调用属性。

trans-unit.source: If a static member will be invoked, the <see langword="Static" /> flag of <see langword="BindingFlags" /> must be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果要调用静态成员，则必须设置 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 的 <see langword="Static" /> 标志。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see langword="MemberInfo" /> objects through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它启用绑定、对参数类型的强制、对成员的调用，以及通过反射对 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 对象的检索。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>binder</c> 为 <see langword="null" />，则使用默认活页夹。

trans-unit.source: Optional index values for indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 索引化属性的可选索引值。

trans-unit.source: This value should be <see langword="null" /> for non-indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 对于非索引化属性，该值应为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="CultureInfo" /> object that represents the culture for which the resource will be localized.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="CultureInfo" /> 对象，它表示资源将针对哪个区域性进行本地化。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the resource is not localized for this culture, the <see langword="CultureInfo.Parent" /> method will be called successively in search of a match.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果没有为此区域性本地化该资源，则在搜索匹配项的过程中将继续调用 <see langword="CultureInfo.Parent" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: If this value is <see langword="null" />, the <see langword="CultureInfo" /> is obtained from the <see langword="CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为 <see langword="null" />，则从 <see langword="CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture" /> 属性获得 <see langword="CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue(System.Object,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue(System.Object,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The property value for the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> 参数的属性值。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue%2A> method returns the value of a property having the specified binding, index, and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue%2A>方法返回具有指定绑定、 索引，属性的值和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: An identifier of a member.
trans-unit.target: 成员的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 留待将来使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中解释参数的区域设置上下文。

trans-unit.source: Flags describing the context of the call.
trans-unit.target: 描述调用的上下文的标志。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 指向一个结构的指针，该结构包含一个自变量数组、一个命名自变量的 DISPID 自变量数组和数组中元素数的计数。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the location where the result will be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指向结果存储位置的指针。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a structure that contains exception information.
trans-unit.target: 指向一个包含异常信息的结构的指针。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first argument that has an error.
trans-unit.target: 第一个出错自变量的索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
trans-unit.target: 提供对某一对象公开的属性和方法的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::Invoke`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object to which the custom attributes are applied.
trans-unit.target: 将应用自定义属性的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: true to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: true 表示搜索此成员的继承链以查找这些特性；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one or more instances of the <paramref name="attributeType" /> parameter are applied to this member; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对此成员应用了 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 参数的一个或多个实例，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined%2A> method indicates whether one or more instance of the `attributeType` parameter is applied to this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined%2A>方法指示一个或多个实例`attributeType`参数应用于此成员。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.IsSpecialName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.IsSpecialName" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this property is the special name; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性是特殊名称，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.IsSpecialName%2A> property sets a value indicating whether the property is the special name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.IsSpecialName%2A>属性设置一个值，该值指示属性是否特殊名称。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.MemberType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.MemberType" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberTypes" /> values indicating that this member is a property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberTypes" /> 值之一，指示此成员是一个属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.MemberType%2A> property gets a <xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes> value indicating that this member is a property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.MemberType%2A>属性可以获取<xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes>值，该值指示此成员属性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object containing the name of this member.
trans-unit.target: 包含此成员的名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A> property gets the name of the current member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A>属性获取当前成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The type of this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A> property gets the type of this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType%2A>属性获取此属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType" /> 属性的与版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object through which this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> object was obtained.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，通过它获取了此 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType%2A> property gets the class object that was used to obtain this <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType%2A>属性获取用于获取此类对象<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue%2A> method sets the property value for the given object to the given value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue%2A>方法将给定对象的属性值设置为给定的值。

trans-unit.source: The object whose property value will be set.
trans-unit.target: 将设置其属性值的对象。

trans-unit.source: The new value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Optional index values for indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 索引化属性的可选索引值。

trans-unit.source: This value should be <see langword="null" /> for non-indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 对于非索引化属性，该值应为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object[])" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object[])" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue%2A> method sets the value of the property with optional index values for index properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue%2A>方法设置的属性的值用索引化属性的可选索引值。

trans-unit.source: The object whose property value will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 将返回其属性值的对象。

trans-unit.source: The new value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的新值。

trans-unit.source: The invocation attribute.
trans-unit.target: 调用属性。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />: <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="CreateInstance" />, <see langword="Static" />, <see langword="GetField" />, <see langword="SetField" />, <see langword="GetProperty" />, or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 中的位标志：<see langword="InvokeMethod" /><see langword="CreateInstance" /><see langword="Static" /><see langword="GetField" /><see langword="SetField" /><see langword="GetProperty" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: A suitable invocation attribute must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定合适的调用属性。

trans-unit.source: If a static member will be invoked, the <see langword="Static" /> flag of <see langword="BindingFlags" /> must be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果要调用静态成员，则必须设置 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 的 <see langword="Static" /> 标志。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它启用绑定、对参数类型的强制、对成员的调用，以及通过反射对 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象的检索。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>binder</c> 为 <see langword="null" />，则使用默认活页夹。

trans-unit.source: Optional index values for indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 索引化属性的可选索引值。

trans-unit.source: This value should be <see langword="null" /> for non-indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 对于非索引化属性，该值应为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that represents the culture for which the resource will be localized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 对象，它表示资源将针对哪个区域性进行本地化。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the resource is not localized for this culture, the <see langword="CultureInfo.Parent" /> method will be called successively in search of a match.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果没有为此区域性本地化该资源，则在搜索匹配项的过程中将继续调用 <see langword="CultureInfo.Parent" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: If this value is <see langword="null" />, the <see langword="CultureInfo" /> is obtained from the <see langword="CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为 <see langword="null" />，则从 <see langword="CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture" /> 属性获得 <see langword="CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue(System.Object,System.Object,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue(System.Object,System.Object,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue%2A> method sets the property value for the given object to the given value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue%2A>方法将给定对象的属性值设置为给定的值。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 COM 对象提供对 <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> 方法的版本无关的访问。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。
